name: Magic Mayhem
description:
The mischievous, evil wizard Magex is tired of all these heroes running around, and he's ready to put a stop to that! With powerful magic at his disposal, fighting through hordes of heroes should be easy enough, right?

CONTROLS:

Z = Jump

X = Shoot

A = Select Previous Spell

S= Select Next Spell

F4 = Fullscreen

Esc = Escape

Coding all done by Goraiken (Me)

Boss Theme done also by Goraiken

Sprites, the rest of the music, and SFX done by PixelPerfect/PixelPerfection

Made for Weekly Game Jam #150, theme being "You're the Enemy"
